content.text: Assume that _{{2*j}}_ more soap bars get spoiled, does the shopkeeper make a profit or loss?

solution.text:
From first part, total CP = Rs. _{{200*j*k}}_
Since _{{2*j}}_ more soaps get spoiled, hence total new SP = (_{{8*j}}_-_{{2*j}}_) x _{{30*k}}_ = Rs. _{{180*j*k}}_
\( \Rightarrow \) Since CP>SP, the shopkeeper makes a loss.
